ygData.subject: Re: SK or Pali
ygData.msgSnippet: actually since my last post i havent had a problem getting groups even tho i never got a response from anyone here and over the last week i have been main tank
ygData.messageBody:
actually since my last post i havent had a problem getting groups
even tho i never got a response from anyone here and over the last
week i have been main tank over any other class ive grouped with sk
war doesnt matter since as a pally i have similar spells to a cleric
if there isnt one in group i can buff myself with symbol and if there
is no cleric available to rez the unfortunate dead group member on
occasions pallys can rez but back to the main tank part of it i dunno
if its just because pallys have higher ac and hp than sks there level
or if its just the gear i have



http://www.magelo.com/eq_view_profile.html?num=187066


Xariak Holcan
52 Pally
Tribunal
